# uniformTypeIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The uniform type identifier for the resource.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniformTypeIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you do not specify a value for this property, Photos infers the data type from the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetResourceType] value you specify when adding the resource to a creation request.

For details in uniform type identifiers, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/FileManagement/Conceptual/understanding_utis/understand_utis_intro/understand_utis_intro.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40001319].

## Describing a New Asset Resource

- **originalFilename**: The filename for the asset resource being created.
- **contentType**: The type of data being provided for this asset resource. If not specified, one will be inferred from the PHAssetResourceType or file URL extension (if provided).
